1082.question: What systems are tested?
1082.response: {'Answer': 'various systems, extractor fine-tuning system, four x-vector/PLDA systems, BULATS-trained baseline systems, two adapted systems, VoxCeleb-based systems'}
1082.answer:
BULATS i-vector/PLDA
BULATS x-vector/PLDA
VoxCeleb x-vector/PLDA
PLDA adaptation (X1)
 Extractor fine-tuning (X2)
